Title: The Underworld
Hints: Be creative and make up a location to match the title. This is a sci-fi scene, it should not contain any classical fantasy elements. Be adventurous and try things unusual random ideas out.
Author: Wizards Code
Prompt:
A bleak, desolate landscape, with a foreboding sky filled with dark, swirling clouds. The ground is uneven and cracked, with jagged, metallic rocks scattered throughout. In the background, towering, twisted structures resembling a mix between ancient ruins and advanced machinery rise toward the sky, covered in eerie, pulsing neon lights. Small streams of toxic, glowing liquid run through the scene, illuminating the dark shadows in unsettling hues of green and purple. Various shadowy figures and twisted creatures lurk in the corners, obscured by the low lighting levels. The overall color scheme is dominated by dark, muted colors with occasional bursts of neon, enhancing the scene's eerie and dangerous atmosphere. 

Tags: dark, low lighting, shadows, neon lights, eerie, desolate, jagged rocks, metallic, ancient ruins, advanced machinery, toxic liquid, sci-fi, foreboding, fear, danger, minimal detail, bold lines
